name: web-asm-jit
description: A toy JIT using web assembly as the compilation target

scripts.test: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' node --experimental-wasm-bigint node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -r ts-node/register --reporter mochawesome 'tests/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.test1: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' node --experimental-wasm-bigint node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -r ts-node/register --reporter mochawesome 'tests/**/lists.test.ts'
scripts.fuzz: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' node --experimental-wasm-bigint node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -r ts-node/register --reporter mochawesome 'fuzzer/**/*.test.ts'
